typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> MoviesDB
MoviesDB filter(toInteger(year) >= 1910 && toInteger(year) <= 2000 && rlike(genres,'Comedy')) ~> FilterYear
FilterYear aggregate(groupBy(year),
	AvgComedyRating = avg(toInteger(Rating))) ~> AverageComedyRating
AverageComedyRating sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['MoviesAvgRating.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DataOutput
